channel.title: Comments on: Over 5000 inspiring sites in the fridge

item.title: By: kühlschrank standgerät test
item.dc:creator: kühlschrank standgerät test
item.description:
I have not checked in here for a while because I thought it was getting boring, but the last several posts are great quality so I guess I’ll add you back to my daily bloglist.
You deserve it friend :)
item.content:encoded:
I have not checked in here for a while because I thought it was getting boring, but
the last several posts are great quality so I guess
I’ll add you back to my daily bloglist.

You deserve it friend

item.title: By: Web Design Huddersfield
item.dc:creator: Web Design Huddersfield
item.description: Great work, congrats! you are doing great job by providing cool web design collections.
item.content:encoded: Great work, congrats! you are doing great job by providing cool web design collections.

item.title: By: Linda
item.dc:creator: Linda
item.description: I found a very nice website for graphics inspiration www.designget.com
item.content:encoded:
I found a very nice website for graphics inspiration
http://www.designget.com

item.title: By: Steve Rydz
item.dc:creator: Steve Rydz
item.description:
Hi Jim,
Firstly congratulations. 5000 sites is quite a feat. I've certainly found this site to be a great source of inspiration over the past couple of years.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jim,

Firstly congratulations. 5000 sites is quite a feat. I’ve certainly found this site to be a great source of inspiration over the past couple of years.

item.title: By: Wayne Saunders
item.dc:creator: Wayne Saunders
item.description:
Congratulations for hitting 5000!
Agree with the first post, you definitely don't get the recognition you deserve. Never a day passes without having a look at what's new! Keep up the good work and here's to the next 5000!
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations for hitting 5000!

Agree with the first post, you definitely don’t get the recognition you deserve. Never a day passes without having a look at what’s new! Keep up the good work and here’s to the next 5000!

item.title: By: Ian Mintz
item.dc:creator: Ian Mintz
item.description:
Congrats!
The design is already very nice, but I'm sure you'll think of ways to improve it. Unfortunately, I can't. Haha.
item.content:encoded:
Congrats!

The design is already very nice, but I’m sure you’ll think of ways to improve it. Unfortunately, I can’t. Haha.

item.title: By: Jari Sanders
item.dc:creator: Jari Sanders
item.description: Congrats! I agree with Owen about the hover thing, keep it up!
item.content:encoded:
Congrats!
I agree with Owen about the hover thing, keep it up!

item.title: By: owen
item.dc:creator: owen
item.description:
Oh, and as a possible improvement...
It would be cool if we hovered over the images and got a screenshot of the entire site... sort of like the thumbnails you get in your default Chrome or Safari startpages.
Whatcha think?
item.content:encoded:
Oh, and as a possible improvement…

It would be cool if we hovered over the images and got a screenshot of the entire site… sort of like the thumbnails you get in your default Chrome or Safari startpages.

Whatcha think?

item.title: By: owen
item.dc:creator: owen
item.description:
You've created one of the best inspiration sites on the net, dude. Please keep it up.
I visit daily.... heck, I'd pay a monthly fee to get the content you collect.
Cheers from Canada!
-O
item.content:encoded:
You’ve created one of the best inspiration sites on the net, dude. Please keep it up.

I visit daily…. heck, I’d pay a monthly fee to get the content you collect.

Cheers from Canada!

-O

item.title: By: Lee Pfeil
item.dc:creator: Lee Pfeil
item.description:
Since you tag each entry with multiple tags, would it not be possible to sift through the entries by selecting multiple tags, instead of only being able to choose one? I would really like to see this happen!
Tremendous efforts in maintaining this site. It's a great resource for me and many others. Thank you!
item.content:encoded:
Since you tag each entry with multiple tags, would it not be possible to sift through the entries by selecting multiple tags, instead of only being able to choose one? I would really like to see this happen!

Tremendous efforts in maintaining this site. It’s a great resource for me and many others. Thank you!

item.title: By: Stephan Margolis
item.dc:creator: Stephan Margolis
item.description: Great taste, great job. A major source of inspiration for me. Makes my life much easier with my clients.. thanks
item.content:encoded: Great taste, great job. A major source of inspiration for me. Makes my life much easier with my clients.. thanks
